name: AbdominalOrPelvicCTScanWithContrast
title: Abdominal or Pelvic CT Scan with Contrast
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this SNOMED CT value set is to represent concepts for abdominal and/or pelvic CT scans with contrast.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent abdominal and/or pelvic CT scans with contrast.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent abdominal and/or pelvic CT scans without contrast.)
